West_Allis.St. Peter's Evangelical Lutheran Church: The Wisconsin Evangelical Lutheran Synod (WELS) is an American Confessional Lutheran denomination of Christianity. Characterized as theologically conservative, it was founded in 1850 in Milwaukee, Wisconsin. As of 2016, it had a baptized membership of 369,221 in 1,270 congregations, with churches in 47 US states and 4 provinces of Canada.
